title: 109_hr6288
content: International Tax Simplification Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise rules relating to foreign income and income earned by controlled foreign corporations , including to: (1) make permanent the active financing exemption for qualified insurance income and the look-thru treatment applicable to related foreign corporations. (2) eliminate foreign base company sales and services income and oil related income from foreign base company income. (3) repeal certain rules for the application of the foreign tax credit to foreign oil and gas income. (4) extend from 10 to 20 years the carryforward period for excess foreign taxes. (5) accelerate from 2008 to 2006 the election to allocate interest earned by an affiliated group of corporations on a worldwide basis. And (6) increase to $5 million the tax exclusion for foreign base company or gross insurance income .
